data.text: @UKHSA You forgot sue the government for vax harms

@millins_v @UKHSA Let's never forget that Putin uses propaganda to change the sense of reality in Russia. While here in the UK, government propaganda managed to tell us we need to live with a virus that kills 'ONLY' 752 a week? Coincidence? #propaganda #democracy #Dictatorship

@millins_v @UKHSA while UK pretends to help Ukraine fight for freedom, UK government will probably use this opportunity to distract from completely running to the ground the whole public health response!

@millins_v @UKHSA and not face coverings, in 3 years of a deadly pandemic, maybe we can call them masks. Maybe we can learn that only upgraded masks protect against omicron. But government propaganda doesn't want us to know about masks, long covid,access to antivirals. UKHSA=government PROPAGANDA!

@ScotlandFC1 @UKHSA How much does this government tamper with UK institutions, extending their corruption deep into the UK society? This isn't democracy, when the power of those leading can easily silence so many, while looking after dangerous lobbyists at any cost! Why do we all accept this?
@UKHSA China hide the truth and spread the virus since 2019
